titles.title: CB 203 I will sing unto the Lord (horse and rider)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
I will sing unto the Lord
For He has triumphed gloriously
The horse and rider thrown into the sea
x2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
The Lord my God
my strength my song
Has now become my victory
The Lord my God
my strength my song
Has now become my victory

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
The Lord is God and I will praise Him
My Father's God
and I will exalt Him
The Lord is God and I will praise Him
My Father's God and
I will exalt Him
